basics.name: Dmitry Ivanov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Originally from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. Earned Master's degree in Computer Graphics (CS) at Baltic State Technical University. Started as UI freelance designer taking part in local startups and projects, then performed at kudago.com as a UI-designer / frontend developer. Later moved to Canada, Montreal, where collaborated with local businesses (TTBA, Amazemontreal, Rage Academy) and contributed to open-source. Afterwards worked at Plotly Inc. as WebGL specialist. Then at Mobeewave, specialized in payments systems, later transitioned to Apple into Wallet and Payments teams. Then tried luck at Elevenlabs, working on text to speech generation.

work.name: Eleven Labs
highlights: Designing, developing and launching speech generation SAAS.

work.name: Apple
work.summary: Apple Wallet / Apple Pay teams web projects
highlights: Apple Business Registry portal frontend work

work.name: Mobeewave
work.summary: Fintech company specialized on accepting card payments with a phone.
highlights: Samsung Point of Sale web app
Admin portal app based on aspect-oriented framework

work.name: Vectioneer
work.summary: Vectioneer is robotics company based in Netherlands, needed performant waveform renderer, 1kHz update rate.

work.name: Plotly Inc
work.summary: Plotly.js is javascript graphing library that powers plotly. Held position of resident webgl specialist.
highlights: Regl-based WebGL core components - scatter, line, splom
Best in class scatterplot point clustering algorithm

work.name: TTBA group
work.summary: Web agency specializing in web-design, advertisment and social media marketing. Responsibilities included developing and optimizing web-sites.
highlights: Design, markup and maintenance of shopsvelte.com, pegasie.com, coutureonly.com, socialboomwifi.com, citenova.com, wishbox.gift, ecobrandshow.ca

highlights: WebGL-based audio visualizers: spectrum, spectrogram, waveform

keywords: should we really pay for that typeface?
